alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Pike; Susquehanna; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 5:59PM EDT until April 22 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sullivan County in central New York... Southeastern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Eastern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elmhurst, or 9 miles east of Scranton, moving northeast at 50 mph. A cluster of severe thunderstorms was also over Pike County. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dunmore, Carbondale, Bushkill, Archbald, Blakely, Dickson City, Olyphant, Lackawaxen and Blooming Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
